mapper.insert: insert into youtube_content(title, channel_name, channel_id, video_id, view_count, like_count, dislike_count, published_time, comments, user_id) values(#{param.title}, #{param.channel_name} , #{param.channel_id}, #{param.video_id}, #{param.view_count}, #{param.like_Count}, #{param.dislike_count}, #{param.published_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.comments}, #{param.user_id});
